full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Invitation to Participate in the Light Construction Equipment Rental Supply Arrangement

#### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites offers from suppliers to rent light construction equipment on behalf of Federal Government Departments located in the Ontario region.

#### Key Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4052927717-Doc4053526199
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4052927717
* **Publication Date**: June 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 30, 2028, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Competitive Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Scope of Work

The supply arrangement seeks offers from suppliers to provide rental of light construction equipment, including but not limited to:

* Powered and non-powered hand tools
* Ladders and scaffolding
* Work platforms
* Walk-behind grounds keeping equipment

#### Trade Agreements and Certifications

The contract may be subject to trade agreements including:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Contact Information

* **David Barltrop**, Contracting Officer
* **Email**: david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (phone number will be provided with request for documents)

#### Notice URL

The notice is available at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16583696?extsite=MTY1ODM2OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

To express interest or request tender documents, please contact David Barltrop at david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking bids for the rental of light construction equipment and you are invited to participate in this solicitation
